foreignData.name: Kupferlinienschlucht
foreignData.text:
Die Kupferlinienschlucht kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder weniger andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}.

foreignData.name: Desfiladero Limitecúpreo
foreignData.text:
El Desfiladero Limitecúpreo entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles otras dos o menos tierras.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G}.

foreignData.name: Gorge de Lignecuivre
foreignData.text:
La Gorge de Lignecuivre arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez deux autres terrains ou moins.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}.

foreignData.name: Gola di Linea Ramata
foreignData.text:
La Gola di Linea Ramata entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli al massimo altre due terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}.

foreignData.name: 銅線の地溝
foreignData.text:
他の、あなたがコントロールしている土地が３つ以上であるかぎり、銅線の地溝はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。

foreignData.name: 구리선 협곡
foreignData.text:
구리선 협곡은 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이하로 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.

foreignData.name: Desfiladeiro da Linha de Cobre
foreignData.text:
Desfiladeiro da Linha de Cobre entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle dois outros terrenos ou menos.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}.

foreignData.name: Ущелье Медной Границы
foreignData.text:
Ущелье Медной Границы выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем есть не менее трех других земель.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {G}.

foreignData.name: 铜索峡谷
foreignData.text:
除非由你操控的其他地数量为两个或更少，否则铜索峡谷须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。

foreignData.name: 銅索峽谷
foreignData.text:
除非由你操控的其他地數量為兩個或更少，否則銅索峽谷須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。

name: Copperline Gorge
originalText:
Copperline Gorge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

rulings.text: If one of these lands is your first, second, or third land, it enters the battlefield untapped. If you control three or more other lands, however, it enters the battlefield tapped.

If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands (due to Oblivion Sower or Warp World, perhaps), it doesn’t take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.

text:
Copperline Gorge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
